Class WindowPatternCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.windowpattern.WindowPatternCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class WindowPatternCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Window Pattern Card class This class contains the definition of a single Window Pattern card
